1: The song of the stairs. I lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
2: My help cometh even from the LORD which hath made heaven and earth.
3: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved, and he that keepeth thee, sleepeth not.
4: Behold, he that keepeth Israel, doth neither slumber nor sleep.
5: The LORD himself is thy keeper, the LORD is thy defense upon thy right hand.
6: So that the sun(Sonne) shall not burn thee by day, neither the moon by night.
7: The LORD preserveth thee from all evil, yea it is the LORD that keepeth thy soul.
8: The LORD preserveth thy going out and thy coming in, from this time forth for evermore.
